channel.title: Custom Tab
channel.description: I added a custom tab to my client where it shows the saff members but my friend had a good idea. Is there a way to make it so when someone types ::givemod or admin it adds them to the list?

item.title: Custom Tab
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“JustChillBro, post:3, topic:425674”]Haha yeah its just its client sided so I would have to jar the client each time someone became a staff member.[/quote]^ this…now if you had an open interface like when you did ::stafflist there MAY be a way to do that.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Tab
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

JustChillBro:

I added a custom tab to my client where it shows the saff members but my friend had a good idea. Is there a way to make it so when someone types ::givemod or admin it adds them to the list?

I don’t see how it would work without updating the serv so if your going to update the serv might as well just add there name to it instead of bein’ lazy.

Read full topic
